subject: Football
lead_paragraph: West Virginia running back Steve Slaton will forgo his senior season to enter the N.F.L. draft. A Mountaineers spokesman, Mike Montoro, confirmed Sunday that Slaton informed the coaching staff of his decision Sunday afternoon. Slaton’s decision was first reported by ESPN.com.
